## transclusion

I need to be able to transclude/ reference a specific block. they have IDs so it should be as simple as something like

ur...deadbeef#block_id

- [ ] number blocks rather than uuids?
- [ ] how are they selected for @ing
- [ ] should blocks have more properties/annotations. tags? should they have tags? I could see tagging a specific markdown block as "type=decision" and wanting to select all decision blocks.
- [x] expose blocks in SQL interface

## search

similar to above I want to search blocks based on tags.
